title: 02/17/2021 – Hour 2 – Carson Wentz Is Facing An Uphill Battle
itunes:title: 02/17/2021 – Hour 2 – Carson Wentz Is Facing An Uphill Battle
description:
LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress sit in for Dan Patrick and talk about what is in store for Carson Wentz as teams inquire about making a trade for the Eagles QB. Draymond Green took to the media to vent his frustrations about a double standard in the NBA but are the guys on the same page as him? Plus, is it finally time for a rebuild in Pittsburgh? 


Subscribe, rate and review Up On Game with LaVar Arrington, T.J. Houshmandzadeh and Plaxico Burress. Listen to the show LIVE on Fox Sports Radio Saturdays 1-3pm ET!

https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/up-on-game/id1542652485

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
